Control Name: Performs in a Timely Manner—Responsible personnel perform control activities in a timely manner as defined by the policies and procedures.

control_attributes.Control: Performs in a Timely Manner—Responsible personnel perform control activities in a timely manner as defined by the policies and procedures.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC5.3 COSO Principle 12: The entity deploys control activities through policies that establish what is expected and in procedures that put policies into action.
